description: Azure Standard and Premium SSD Storage Disks having 1) maximum & average Volume ReadOPS & WriteIOPS lesser than IOPS supported by "Standard HDD" and 2) maximum & average Throughput lesser than Max Throughput supported by "Standard HDD" are recommended to be switched to "Standard HDD" to save cost
